availability.p: This work is the property of the Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN. It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the Tennessee State Library and Archives, 403 Seventh Avenue North, Nashville, TN 37243-0312. (615) 741-2764.

bibl.title: [Entries from the Cherokee Supreme Court Docket, 1823-1834, New Echota] 1827 Oct. 17
bibl.note: This is an excerpt from the Cherokee Supreme Court docket for the years 1823 to 1834. The Cherokee Supreme Court convened annually in New Echota beginning on the second Monday in October and lasting three weeks. This is from the October 17, 1827 session of court, during which a trover case was heard. The costs of suit are detailed herein. Entries from this Supreme Court docket cover items ch100-ch163.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div1.head: October & November 1827-
Wednesday 17th
div1.p: The Court find for the plaintiff twenty eight dollars & cost of Suit
22nd of October 1827 Recd. of the defendant one dollar & sixty-eight cents cost for appeal. John Martin N.T.

Joshua Buffington
&
Alfred Hudson
Heirs of T. Buffington decd.
vs
Moses Downing
heir of J. Downing ded.
Trover. Try the rights of a certain negro Boy Jack _
The Court find for the defendant and Tax the plaintiff with the Cost

p.add: Recd. the above cost of fifteen dollars 2nd Nov. 1827

div1.p: The Court adjourned untill tomorrow 10 Oclock
